h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
content: However, this won’t end Fuban’s underground reign of terror, as he’ll keep moving his horn up and down from below the sands to attack twice as his horn moves up and down, so keep dodging to stay out of the way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Fuban'.
The content is as follows:
However, this won’t end Fuban’s underground reign of terror, as he’ll keep moving his horn up and down from below the sands to attack twice as his horn moves up and down, so keep dodging to stay out of the way.
